Happy Tuesday Bagley Flyers! Last night the Bagley School Board hosted a live Zoom session, that had over 100 guests. We reviewed our plans for the upcoming school year. The Bagley School Board had a focused discussion and brought up important concerns and advocated what they thought was best for our students. Three motions were put forward and resulted in a tie vote. Because of the three failed attempts to pass the motion, the action item was tabled to a later date. The special board meeting has been set for Saturday, August 22 at 8am. Here is the link to the proposed plan that was presented at last night's meeting. https://sites.google.com/bagley.k12.mn.us/bagleypublicschools/home
Thank you for your patience in this matter. We are not taking this decision lightly. We want what is best for your children, our students, and the Bagley community.
